metadata.title: Gustavo Gomez | Software Engineer
metadata.OPdescription: Custom web and mobile software development.

home.title: Let's make your project a reality
home.description: Do you have an idea? I make it a reality with custom solutions in web and mobile development, creating efficient technology adapted to your needs

about.title: About me
about.description1: Hello I'm Gustavo. Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience creating solutions for companies from different sectors, adapting each project to their needs and offering clear and effective results.
about.description2: I specialize in transforming ideas into technological solutions. I offer software development with attention to detail, innovation and total commitment to meeting project objectives.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Expert advice to make your project a success.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Creation of functional websites adapted to your needs.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: Custom mobile apps, designed for any platform.

agn.title: Production Management and Monitoring System
agn.description: Comprehensive solution for managing workers and production. The mobile app allows scanning QR codes, tracking hours and locations, with customized profiles for supervisors, cooks, and security guards. The web platform provides administrators with real-time production tracking, key performance indicators, and data generated from the mobile app, even without an internet connection.

lexsport.title: Employment and Production Management System
lexsport.description: Supervisors can input daily production and track workers' schedules, including start, break, and end times, for automatic payment calculation. Admins manage worker profiles, product details, and easily monitor payments within the platform..
